name: Mooty
short_description:
The Mooty Tool Kit (MTK) is a feature-rich Bash tool kit that makes it easy for you to perform High Performance Administration (HPA) task in your environment.

HPA task include:
* Mass-management of computers
* Deployment of files
* Collection of system data reports
* And much, much more

The MTK leverages existing Network Operating System infrastructure, so it is very light, flexible, portable and powerful.

The kit comes with multiple tools that make mass management simple and effective.  The MTK can be set up quickly, and torn down just as quickly.

Use the MTK when you need tools to perform mass tasks BELOW other configuration and mass management tools.

The source code for Mooty compiles into this single, useful MTK file, making it extremely portable and worthy to carry on a USB stick or to be sent via an email.
